pullRequest.body:
This is the first part of #12819, which I decided to split into two parts. The initial goal is to enable the use of sparse matrices in the `linarith`'s oracle based on the Simplex Algorithm, which speeds up `linarith`, and especially `nlinarith`, in many cases.

* Introduce the `UsableInSimplexAlgorithm` class, which specifies the operations required from a matrix type for use in Gauss Elimination and the Simplex Algorithm within the corresponding oracle for the `linarith` tactic. Rewrite these algorithms to use this class, allowing any matrix type to be used.
* Make `Matrix` an instance of this class.

---

### PR summary [f4141ee81c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13535/commits/f4141ee81cf06ffa8f379a44d6e05eb8b6cb0314)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Tableau`
`+ UsableInSimplexAlgorithm`
`+ getTableau`
`+ getTableauImp`
`+ instance (n m : Nat) (matType : Nat → Nat → Type) [UsableInSimplexAlgorithm matType] :`
`+ instance : UsableInSimplexAlgorithm Matrix`
`- SimplexAlgorithmState`
`- Table`
`- divideRow`
`- getTable`
`- getTableImp`
`- instance (n m : Nat) : GetElem (Matrix n m) Nat (Array Rat) fun _ i => i < n`
`- runSimplexAlgorithmImp`
`- subtractRow`
`- swapRows`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/12093a5f-4c00-46af-b4e6-0c5c1045bd9a) for commit 997cad55572f7c7de33856df2165ba87c3067411.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/75a9085d-70cf-4788-ad75-c804d0610373/to/12093a5f-4c00-46af-b4e6-0c5c1045bd9a) against commit cc768630e3118d913d6557cd549548fefd510160:
```diff
  Benchmark                                     Metric         Change
  ===================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Instances.Sphere   instructions    -5.9%
```
(I should add: I completely missed your PR a few month ago implementing the simplex oracle and changing linarith over. This is fantastic work and really appreciated!)

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9471767728/job/26095743038)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9471767728/job/26095743283)
This looks like a totally reasonable generalization!

```suggestion
`Tableau` is a structure the Simplex Algorithm operates on. The `i`-th row of `mat` expresses the
```
and below? (c.f. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simplex_algorithm#Simplex_tableau)

(Sorry, for some reason this didn't get submitted yesterday. This is my only request, then I'll merge.)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Tactic/Linarith): introduce `UsableInSimplexAlgorithm` class to allow the use of sparse matrix types in the oracle

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Tactic/Linarith): use sparse matrices
